products.name: Asti Oak Engineered Hardwood Flooring
products.description: Astipromises an economical choice within our wide planked ABCD grade selection and is guaranteed to add a modern feel to your current or upcoming renovation with its dark fumed color and style combination. This wood floor is finished with several layers of UV lacquer in order to achieve a special finish which provides leveling, protection, as well as a light sheen. These floors are lightly wire brushed to create the benefit of fine texture while still maintaining a smooth appearance and overall feel.

details.finish: Matte UV Urethane Aluminum Oxide Finish

products.name: Taranto European Oak Engineered Hardwood Flooring
products.description: Tarantoguarantees an economical choice within our ABCD grade collection and we assure you that it will give a modern feel to your current or upcoming renovation with its classic Natural European White Oak color and style combination. This distinctive wood floor is cured with layers of UV Lacquer Finish to create both a natural feel and look while maintaining excellent protection. Together with light sanding and wire brushing treatments, these floors boast an elegant texture while maintaining their sleek presentation.

details.finish: Matte UV Urethane Aluminum Oxide Finish
